About me

Hi, my name is Kalgi Patel. I am from India. I have done my graduation in Bachelor of Computer Applications. Currently, I am studying Internet Applications and Web Development at Algonquin College. I moved to Ottawa a few months ago.

Basically, I like designing web pages. I have a special interest towards HTML, Javascript and Cascading Style Sheet.
